about_the_game:
The Ghost of Nichishima - In the midst of a relentless storm, you've just moved into the quaint, seemingly peaceful village of Nichishima. But peace is short-lived when a power outage plunges your new home into darkness. Seeking aid, you venture into the village, where it will be down to you to decide the fate of Nichishima, if you survive. 

Fear of the unknown! Don't let yourself get too scared by having too many encounters with your strange fellow residents and other supernatural beings, some more dangerous than others.

Multiple endings! There is more than one way to find peace in this isolated land, and it will be your choice which way you choose. Find a solution to the village's problem and bring peace to it one way or another but be wary, each choice has its own consiquence.

Freedom! You are not bound to your house, you can go looking around the village and even the surrounding woodland, shrine, school and inside other houses. Just be warned, not all residents will be so welcoming.

Reasons to return! There will be lots to see and encounter but you may also miss a lot on your first playthrough. Expect to find hidden events, easter eggs and creepy encounters as you explore, look far and up close.

Realistic graphics, weather effects and a strong narrative come together to create this immersive first person horror experience, are you ready to be in these shoes? 

You will be able to use a range of equipment to help you with your investigating such as a flash light, A lighter to light candles and help you see when you have no other light. An instant camera to take pictures  that you can keep to help remember things or even see things your eyes cannot.

content_descriptors.notes: There will scenes that are designed to be frightening featuring paranormal elements. There is the ability for your character to die due to fear and this may be a result of being attacked by a paranormal being. There will be lore and hints of death and how characters perished as well as blood being visible on some characters.

short_description: You thought moving to a peaceful Japanese village and starting a new life was a good idea, well was it? Inspired by eerie real life events and Japanese folklore, this immersive first person horror will have you explore Nichishima but you will soon realize that every shadow might hide your fate.
